thread.section_title: EnjoyCPR Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of EnjoyCPR | enjoycpr.com
thread.title: Dave Norman

author: Dave Norman
title: Dave Norman
text: The in-class instruction was very effective at teaching me how to administer CPR and how to use an AED with people of all ages. The instructor provided ample opportunity for hands-on practice and gave good feedback. I believe everyone left there feeling confident in their new-found skills. However, I was hoping for more in depth coverage of first aid, including hands-on practice in applying bandages, splints, etc. One caveat: myself and another student received reminder e-mails the day before that lead us to believe we had to take and pass an on-line course before taking part in the classroom session. We both spent several hours completing the course, which meant that most of the classroom instruction, apart from the hands-on training, was redundant of what we learned on-line. Having said that, the on-line course was one of the better on-line trainings I've experienced.
